MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the DG6 postcode area of Kirkcudbright and Twynholm. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 11.15AM. Repairs are taking longer than expected due to extensive damage to our overhead line network near Muirhead Farm and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 4.00PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was recorded at 12.53PM on 31 October 2020.
